title: Yikes! This Sans Serif with a Really Wide A Is Stumping Me...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130819205254im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20for%20copy%20share%20their%20wedding%20day_6311.jpg)

Can anybody eyeball this font and figure what it is? I've tried all the font id tools (identifont, whatis, myfont) that I know about it. Stumped!

thanks for the help--surprisingly urgent.  
w
author: whl871
